data.message: I have been told and shown a certificate with my name on it that i won over 900,000 dollars on facebook reward program, how true is it??

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Carol. It sounds like a scam. You can confirm that you’ve been contacted by a Facebook representative by asking them to send you an email. Facebook representatives will have an @sales.fb.com, @support.facebook.com or @fb.com email address. All 3 email addresses are valid and only originate from authorized representatives of Facebook. Let us know if there’s anything else we can help you with. -Tenaya
